title: Academic Term Type Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for types of academic terms and periods used in education calendars.

terms.label: Fall Term
terms.definition: An academic term typically occurring in the latter part of the calendar year, often the primary term in a semester-based system.

terms.label: Spring Term
terms.definition: An academic term typically occurring in the early part of the calendar year, often the second primary term in a semester-based system.

terms.label: Summer Term
terms.definition: An academic term occurring during the summer months, often shorter or structured as multiple sessions.

terms.label: Winter Term or Intersession
terms.definition: A short academic term or intersession occurring between major terms, often in the winter months.

terms.label: Full Year
terms.definition: An academic period that spans an entire academic year rather than being divided into separate terms or semesters.

terms.label: Other Academic Term Type
terms.definition: An academic term type that does not fit another, more specific category in this vocabulary, such as custom sessions or blocks.
